overarching_story: In Lexiconia, Shadow Scribe shattered Vowel Spirits' epic quatrains of doom. As Quatrain Warden, quest realms LOTR-style, HP-mysteries. Gather 4 verse fragments per chapter. Wave 5: Insert vowel to rhyme quatrain, reveal shocking banishment twist. All five forge Victory Ode to vanquish Scribe.

waves.background: Avalon's golden hall bustles with mimed feasters in joy, then dread. Slay glutton shades; survivor yields first verse-scroll. (21 words)
Bard's alcove hums faint strums. Mimer gestures soaring tales cut short. Battle harp wraiths; elf offers second scroll. (20 words)

waves.background: Village hearth, laughers mime peals till encroaching dark. Fight mirth goblins; revelers reveal third from embers. (19 words)
Ancient oak groans, seer mimes hearing ominous summons. Vanquish root horrors; she bestows final scroll. (18 words)

waves.riddle: Bard guardian intones: 'Avalon's revel quatrain breaks! Insert one letter to rhyme it whole, unveil Aeloria's shock!'
waves.solution:
A
All feasted in the golden hall.
A bard strummed tales both short and tall.
Laughter rang till shadows fall.
Then Aeloria heard the dark call!

Shrine shadows stir, seer mimes scribe's sudden strike. Shatter thorn illusions; oracle grants final scroll. (19 words)

waves.riddle: Weave-warden echoes: 'Eden's weave quatrain unravels! Insert one letter to rhyme it true, expose Elowen's fall!'
waves.solution:
E
The elves met beneath tall trees.
Weaving spells with joyful ease.
Elowen led the enchanted frieze.
Scribe appeared and brought her to her knees!

Spire summit, guardian mimes cloaking in abyss. Unravel thunder colossi; sage bestows final scroll. (19 words)

waves.riddle: Sight-keeper booms: 'Ithaca's sight quatrain blinds! Insert one letter to rhyme revelation, shock Ithildin's end!'
waves.solution:
I
Isles shimmered in the wizard's sight.
Ithildin unlocked secrets bright.
Islanders glimpsed futures' light.
Then scribe cloaked her in endless night!

waves.riddle: Union sentinel calls: 'Utopia's union quatrain severs! Insert one letter to rhyme bonds, stun Uriel's doom!'
waves.solution:
U
Uriel united us under sun.
Unicorns pranced, every one.
Utopian bliss, second to none.
Until the scribe's dark deed was done!
